ground_truth_answer: While sports drinks can be used for tournament recovery, there are many food alternatives that can replenish electrolytes and provide valuable nutrients not found in sports drinks. These alternatives include chocolate milk, yogurt, bananas, apricots, leafy greens, beans, avocados, raisins, and dates. For tournament recovery, it's recommended to focus on simple carbs like those found in fruit, rather than heavier carbs like whole grain breads and pastas, especially when there is limited time between games.
